description: The absolute geographic location of the Location, expressed using the WGS84 datum (This is the same co-ordinate system used in KML).

element.comment: The extension can be further extended to include unique geolocation identifiers, confidence, altitude, etc.
element.definition: The absolute geographic location of the Location, expressed using the WGS84 datum (This is the same co-ordinate system used in KML).
Latitude. The value domain and the interpretation are the same as for the text of the latitude element in KML (see notes below).
Longitude. The value domain and the interpretation are the same as for the text of the longitude element in KML (see notes below).
